医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
专家敦促将低钠富钾盐纳入高血压治疗指南国际专家组今天在美国心脏协会的科学杂志《高血压》上呼吁将低钠富钾盐的建议纳入高血压治疗指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Experts-urge-the-inclusion-of-low-sodium-potassium-enriched-salt-in-hypertension-treatment-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Experts-urge-the-inclusion-of-low-sodium-potassium-enriched-salt-in-hypertension-treatment-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb058df-0237-44db-8cb8-cae46736dc43 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:10:32 -0500 Experts urge the inclusion of low-sodium potassium-enriched salt in hypertension treatment guidelines
改善儿科脓毒症诊断的新全球标准根据新的研究结果，儿童败血症的诊断得到了改进。由该大学的 Luregn Schlapbach 和苏黎世大学儿童医院共同领导的一个国际研究小组利用人工智能分析了超过 350 万患有这种危及生命的疾病的儿童的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/New-global-criteria-for-improved-diagnosis-of-pediatric-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/New-global-criteria-for-improved-diagnosis-of-pediatric-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3239f3c6-c5af-49fd-a26e-b4bc3be76228 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 15:04:51 -0500 New global criteria for improved diagnosis of pediatric sepsis
瓦莫洛龙治疗杜氏肌营养不良症的公正评估药物瓦莫洛龙（Agamree）被誉为治疗杜氏肌营养不良症（DMD）有前途的新药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Unbiased-assessment-of-vamorolone-for-treating-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Unbiased-assessment-of-vamorolone-for-treating-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb7c0dfd-da2c-4697-ba4b-533c006e35cb Thu, 25 Jan 2024 14:59:36 -0500 Unbiased assessment of vamorolone for treating Duchenne muscular dystrophy
关于放射学人工智能工具的开发和使用发表的开创性联合声明美国放射学会与世界各地其他四个放射学会密切合作，发布了一份关于放射学人工智能 (AI) 工具开发和使用的联合声明。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Groundwriting-joint-statement-issued-on-the-development-and-use-of-AI-tools-in-radiology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Groundwriting-joint-statement-issued-on-the-development-and-use-of-AI-tools-in-radiology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f03d765-6f7c-462f-83da-2b0d57c5028b Thu, 25 Jan 2024 14:53:43 -0500 Groundbreaking joint statement issued on the development and use of AI tools in radiology
结肠镜检查是免费的。但“手术托盘”的标价是 600 美元。去年，尚塔尔·帕诺佐 (Chantal Panozzo) 和她的丈夫在年满 45 岁后遵循了初级保健医生的指示，现在是开始筛查结直肠癌的建议年龄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/The-colonoscopies-were-free-But-the-e28098surgical-trayse28099-came-with-24600-price-tags.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/The-colonoscopies-were-free-But-the-e28098surgical-trayse28099-came-with-24600-price-tags.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7882a42-277d-441f-b827-0074c89e287d Thu, 25 Jan 2024 09:10:13 -0500 The colonoscopies were free. But the ‘surgical trays’ came with $600 price tags.
纽约与地方政府一起消除数十亿美元的医疗债务纽约市本周承诺偿还居民价值 20 亿美元的医疗债务。在这样做的过程中，它转向了一项始于中西部的创新，使数百万美国人摆脱了医疗保健债务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/New-York-joins-local-governments-in-erasing-billions-in-medical-debt.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/New-York-joins-local-governments-in-erasing-billions-in-medical-debt.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e790beea-c763-4f47-a44c-bc76d066df18 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 09:07:29 -0500 New York joins local governments in erasing billions in medical debt
长期研究显示胃绕道术比袖状胃切除术略有优势袖状胃切除术和 Roux-en-Y 胃绕道术对肥胖人群的长期减肥效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Gastric-bypass-shows-slight-edge-over-sleeve-gastrection-in-long-term-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Gastric-bypass-shows-slight-edge-over-sleeve-gastrection-in-long-term-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89dbcd28-12bd-4396-9d30-436088af0890 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 08:24:00 -0500 Gastric bypass shows slight edge over sleeve gastrectomy in long-term study
Lunaphore 和 Acd 推出首款全自动、同截面、超多重组学应用程序，彻底改变了空间生物学研究Bio-Techne Corporation（纳斯达克股票代码：TECH）今天宣布，其空间生物学品牌 Lunaphore 和 Advanced Cell Diagnostics (ACD) 将推出首个全自动空间多组学工作流程，对 RNA 和蛋白质生物标志物进行同切片超复合检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Lunaphore-and-Acd-Revolutionize-Spatial-Biology-Research-With-the-Launch-of-the-First-Fully-Automated-Same-Section- Hyperplex-Multiomics-Application.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Lunaphore-and-Acd-Revolutionize-Spatial-Biology-Research-With-the-Launch-of-the-First-Fully-Automated-Same-Section- Hyperplex-Multiomics-Application.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddeb5fad-e47a-4e62-afd1-37ebad407e67 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 08:03:00 -0500 Lunaphore and Acd Revolutionize Spatial Biology Research With the Launch of the First Fully Automated, Same-Section, Hyperplex Multiomics Application
黄热病疫苗在单次接种后是否真的能提供有效的终身保护以预防该疾病？一剂黄热病疫苗提供的长期保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Do-yellow-fever-vaccines-truly-provide- effective-lifelong-protection-against-the-disease-after-a-single-dose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240125/Do-yellow-fever-vaccines-truly-provide- effective-lifelong-protection-against-the-disease-after-a-single-dose.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4e8de46-34ce-43cb-8efe-a9d413749fc0 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 07:50:00 -0500 Do yellow fever vaccines truly provide effective lifelong protection against the disease after a single dose?
